text:
EyeQuant | Frontend Developer (Interaction Design) | Berlin, Germany | VISA, ONSITE | https://www.eyequant.com

We’re a B2B SaaS scale-up that gives businesses the power to accurately predict how users will engage with designs such as websites, apps, digital banners and print adverts. Fusing the power of neuroscience with AI, EyeQuant’s predictive insights improve the efficiency and effectiveness of a brand’s design and conversion process, helping drive greater revenue and profitability.

We're looking for a mid- to senior-level frontend developer with special focus on interaction design. Please see further details and apply here: https://eyequant.heavenhr.com/jobs/_QKlKqgWBt8gCM6S2GYML6g_/...

Have a great day!
